name: RedShift Prototype
description:
Bullet hell shooter prototype where you fight SPACE crabs*! And can rewind time for up to 10 seconds.

Game for Bullet Hell Jam 2021 UNFINISHED and LATE since 2021

* crabs may not be in uppercase SPACE

Controls

The following control schemes are supported.

XBox Controller
  • Left Stick - Move
  • A - Fire
  • B - Rewind
  • X / RT - Rapid Fire
Keyboard - Arrow keys
  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Z - Fire (hold for slow movement)
  • X - Rewind
  • C - Rapid fire
Keyboard - WASD
  • WASD - Move
  • J - Fire (hold for slow movement)
  • K - Rewind
  • L - Rapid fire
Scoring
  • Gain score by destroying enemies.
  • The amount of score gained is increased when you have a high hit count.
  • Usually, during rewinds, your score is rolled back along with time. However, the current score and hit count is kept during rewinds manually triggered at a full gauge. This allows you to accumulate more score and combos than normally possible.
